  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Podatki in informacije</string>
            <string language="en">Data and Information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten und Informationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Données et information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dados e informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dati e le informazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία και πληροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Datos e información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o podatkih in informacijah v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: analogni/digitalni podatki, tekstovni podatki (urejevalniki besedil, ms office, openoffice), slike, zvok, animacija, video.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about data and information, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: analog/digital data, text data (word processor, ms office, openoffice), images, sounds, animation, video.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podatek</string>
            <string language="en">data</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacija</string>
            <string language="en">information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalniška grafika</string>
            <string language="en">computer graphics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zvok</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Daten und Informationen, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
analog/digital Daten, Textdaten (Textverarbeitungsgerät, 
Msbüro, openoffice), Bilder, Töne, Animation, Bildschirm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet des données et l'information, 
une partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. 
Contenu de chapitre : données d'analog/digital, données 
des textes (unité de traitement de texte, bureau de mme., 
openoffice), images, bruits, animation, vidéo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre dados e informação, parte dos 
e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices do 
capítulo: dados de analog/digital, dados do texto (processador 
de palavra, escritório do ms, openoffice), imagens, sons, animation, 
vídeo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa i dati e le informazioni facente 
parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare 
di capitolo: dati di analog/digital, dati del testo (programma 
di trattamento di testi, ufficio della spettrografia di massa, 
openoffice), immagini, suoni, animazione, video.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τα στοιχεία και πληροφορίες, μέρος των 
ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: αναλογικά/ψηφιακά στοιχεία, 
στοιχεία κειμένων (επεξεργαστής λέξεων, γραφείο κας, 
openoffice), εικόνες, ήχοι, ζωτικότητα, βίντεο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre datos e información, parte de 
los e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido 
del capítulo: datos de analog/digital, datos del texto 
(procesador de textos, oficina del ms, openoffice), imágenes, 
sonidos, animación, vídeo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computergraphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
